title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: In pencil on back: Florence Klodka 11 Years
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: Half drop repeat of department store scenes with shoppers, clothing displays, and information center. Printed in three colors: red, green, and gold (red over green for purple ground).
